Search Engine Optimization (SEO) SEO improves your website’s ranking on search engines like Google. It helps drive organic traffic by optimizing keywords, meta tags, site structure, and backlinks. 2. Pay-Per-Click Advertising (PPC) PPC involves paying for ads that appear on search engines and social media. You’re charged only when someone clicks your ad, making it a cost-effective way to reach potential customers quickly. 3. It’s a broad term that covers various online marketing strategies and tools. Whether you’re a small business or a large corporation, a strong digital presence can increase visibility, build trust, and drive revenue.
